Get configuration for package, if any

Source: R/GetConfig.R
getConfig.Rd

Try to obtain yaml-formatted configuration placed either as given by the environment variable R_RAP_CONFIG_PATH or as provided by the package itself. If none can be found the function exits with an error

getConfig(fileName = "dbConfig.yml", packageName = "rapbase")

Arguments

fileName

String providing configuration file base name
packageName

String providing the package name

Value

A list of (yaml) configuration

Examples

getConfig()
#> $rapbase
#> $rapbase$host
#> [1] "db"
#> 
#> $rapbase$name
#> [1] "rapbase"
#> 
#> $rapbase$user
#> [1] "root"
#> 
#> $rapbase$pass
#> [1] "root"
#> 
#> $rapbase$disp
#> [1] "ForTestingOnly"
#> 
#> 
#> $smerte
#> $smerte$host
#> [1] "db"
#> 
#> $smerte$name
#> [1] "SmerteReportDataStaging"
#> 
#> $smerte$user
#> [1] "root"
#> 
#> $smerte$pass
#> [1] "root"
#> 
#> $smerte$disp
#> [1] "Smerteregisteret"
#> 
#> 
#> $nir
#> $nir$host
#> [1] "db"
#> 
#> $nir$name
#> [1] "IntensivRegisterReportDataStaging"
#> 
#> $nir$user
#> [1] "root"
#> 
#> $nir$pass
#> [1] "root"

#> [1] "Intensivregisteret"
#>
